prepare POST for EdgeX
func:
var coredata_url = "http://localhost:59880/api/v2/"
var apiVersion = '"v2"'
var uuid = global.get("uuid")
var uuid1 = uuid.v4()
var uuid2 = uuid.v4()
var date = new Date()
var timestamp = date.getTime()*1000000

var profileName = '"Sensortag-Profile"'
var deviceName = '"sensortag1"'
var serviceUrl = 'temperature'
var sourceName = '"' + serviceUrl + '"'
var resourceName = '"' + serviceUrl + '"'
var valueType = '"Float32"'
var value = msg.payload.ambient

msg.url = coredata_url + "event/Sensortag-Profile/sensortag1/" + serviceUrl
msg.payload = '{"apiVersion": ' + apiVersion +', "event": ' +
                   '{"apiVersion": ' + apiVersion + ',' +
                    '"deviceName": '+ deviceName + ',' +
                    '"profileName": ' + profileName + ',' +
                    '"sourceName": ' + sourceName + ',' +
                    '"id":"' + uuid1 +'",' +
                    '"origin": ' + timestamp + ',' +
                    '"readings": ' +
                         '[{"id":"' + uuid2 + '",' +
                           '"origin": ' + timestamp + ',' +
                           '"deviceName": ' + deviceName + ',' + 
                           '"resourceName": ' + resourceName + ',' +
                           '"profileName": ' + profileName + ',' +
                           '"valueType": ' + valueType + ',' +
                           '"value": "' + value + '"' +
                           '}]}}'
return msg;

name: led function
window redirect
format:
<script>
(function(scope) {
    scope.$watch('msg.payload', function(data) {
        if (data == "db1") {
          window.open("http://" + window.location.hostname + ":7000/d/TyoT6kigj", "_blank");
        } 
        if (data == "db2") {
          window.open("http://" + window.location.hostname + ":7000/d/TyoT6kigh", "_blank");
        }
    });
})(scope);
</script>

name: extract snap info
extract snap info
Logo / Clock
format:
<script id="clockScript1" type="text/javascript">
    var clockInterval;
    $(function () {
        if (clockInterval) return;

        //add logo
        var div1 = $('<div/>');
        var logo = new Image();

        logo.src = '/uimedia/canonical_logo/Canonical_logo_white.png'
        logo.height = 45;
        div1[0].style.margin = '10px auto';

        div1.append(logo);

        //add clock
        var div2 = $('<div/>');
        var p = $('<p/>');

        div2.append(p);
        div2[0].style.margin = '5px';

        function displayTime() {
            p.text(new Date().toLocaleString());
        }
        
        clockInterval = setInterval(displayTime, 1000);

        //add to toolbar when it's available
        var addToToolbarTimer;
        
        function addToToolbar() {
            var toolbar = $('.md-toolbar-tools');
            
            if(!toolbar.length) return;
            
            toolbar.append(div1);
            //toolbar.append(div2); //don't want clock
            clearInterval(addToToolbarTimer);
        }
        addToToolbarTimer = setInterval(addToToolbar, 100);
    });
</script>

name: auto-select service
Set service profile filename
setup
func:
global.set("core-data_url","http://localhost:59880/api/v2/" )
global.set("core-metadata_url","http://localhost:59881/api/v2/" )

let device_name = "sensortag1"
let device_description = "TI Sensortag #1"

let register_device_service = {
    "name": "sensortag-control-device-service",
    "description": "Manage Sensortag data", 
    "adminState": "UNLOCKED", 
    "labels": ["sensortag","data"], 
    "baseAddress": "sensortag-device-service:59990"
}

let provision_device = {
    "name": device_name,
    "description": device_description,
    "adminState": "UNLOCKED",
    "operatingState": "UP",
    "labels": ["sensortag","data"],
    "location": "{lat:45.45,long:47.80}",
    "serviceName": "sensortag-control-device-service",
    "profileName": "Sensortag-Profile",
    "protocols": {"sensortag-protocol": {"sensortag-address": "localhost","port": "1234","unitID": "1"}},
    "notify": false
}
    
flow.set("device_service_profile_filename","EdgeX_SensortagProfile.yml")
flow.set("register_device_service", register_device_service);
flow.set("provision_device", provision_device);
global.set("device_name",device_name);

return [msg, null];
